query:
SELECT 
  id,
  task_id,
  highlight_id,
  status,
  error_message,
  created_at,
  updated_at
FROM avatar_video_tasks
WHERE created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 10 MINUTE)
ORDER BY created_at DESC;
